songs.title: Depression
songs.lyrics:
I feel alone
I feel so sad
So far away-from her life
I can t resist-all this pain
The sorrow-of all mi life
The silence comes with the night
To take soul and my heart

Take my soul
Take my heart
I can t breath
Anymore
Take my soul
Take my heart
I can t breath
Anymore

In this world
In my place
So far away from her life
I can t resist-all this pain
And the moon
Cry with me
The silence come comes with the night
To take my soul and my heart

Take my soul
Take my heart
I can t breath
Anymore
Take my soul
Take my heart
I can t breath
Anymore
